analyzed: mi zad pa'i dbang po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brtson pa'i dbang po dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i dbang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lung bstan pa la phyir mi ldog par shin tu brtson pa'i dbang po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu phugs pa'i dbang po rdo rje'i khams lta bu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes mtha' dang dbus med pa'i snang bar tu thob pas /
translated: the faculty of inexhaustible faculties, the faculty of diligence in all roots of virtue, the faculty of sameness with regard to all the domains of the buddhas, the faculty of irreversible and diligent prophecy for all bodhisattvas,üîΩthe faculty of the vajra-like essence that is the ultimate of all the qualities of the buddhas, and the faculty of the vajra-like radiance that is the attainment of the light of the boundless wisdom of all the tathƒÅgatas.

original: rdo rje'i 'od 'phro ba'i dbang po dang / dbang po rab tu dbye ba thams cad ma lus pa la dbang sgyur ba'i dbang po dang / sems can mu med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbang po la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rdo rje'i 'od 'phro ba'i dbang po dang / dbang po rab tu dbye ba thams cad ma lus pa la dbang sgyur ba'i dbang po dang / sems can mu med pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbang po la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir /

analyzed: dbang po mtha' yas pa 'byams klas pa dang / dbang po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i dbang po bsgribs pa med cing /

original: rnam par dag pa rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May they attain the unobstructed and pure faculties that are the basis for the complete perfection of all faculties.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rab tu brtson pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rab tu brtson pa'i sems dang ldan pa /

translated: May I have a mind that is free from attachment, liberated, and unfettered, and may I have the magical power of all bodhisattvas, which is limitless and infinite.

original: byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / ye shes mtha' yas pas khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / lus ma g-yos par sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu @9a *//

translated: the miraculous power of the noncomposite instantaneous mind,üîΩthe miraculous power of nondependence through abiding in the absence of things,üîΩthe miraculous power of placing inexpressibly many world systems in a single pore,

translated: May all sentient beings attain the magical power of entering the door of the wisdom of the teachings.üîΩ‚ÄúBy this root of virtue, may I attain the bodhisattva conduct of the bodhisattvas who have entered the pure buddha realms with the wisdom that is free from attachment, liberated and unfettered, who have entered the wisdom of the infinite and boundless buddha realms,

original: skye ba med pa la brtson pa'i sems bskyed pa la 'jug pa dang / @9b kun tu bzang pos rtogs pa'i sgo nas 'jug pas rab tu 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu thob pas /
analyzed: skye ba med pa la brtson pa'i sems bskyed pa la 'jug pa dang / @9b kun tu bzang pos rtogs pa'i sgo nas 'jug pas rab tu 'byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu thob pas /

original: rnam pa'i tshul tha dad pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa /üîΩbsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas rnam par phye ba thob ste /

original: tshad med pa'i smon lam la yang dag par brtson zhing chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang / dus gsum gyi chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu zhugs pa'i sems su kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i tshul kun shes pa dang /

analyzed: de @10a *// bzhin du chos kyi dbyings thams cad la 'jug pa nye bar bzung ste /
translated: In the same way, may I come to know how to enter into all the realms of the world,

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa gyur te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa gyur te /

translated: Through these roots of virtue, may they be able to reveal, with a superior intention, in a single instant of mind, the inexpressible and inconceivable eons of the mind that is free from attachment, liberated, and unfettered.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas yongs su bsngos pas /

original: @41b 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: @41b 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su byung ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate with a mind that has arisen in the lineage of the Tathagatas of the past, present, and future.

original: mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa thob pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa thob pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate with a mind that has attained the unimpaired higher perceptions.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa la grub pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa la grub pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate with a mind that is accomplished in the conduct of omniscience.

original: sems can thams cad sems can dmyal ba nas phyir bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad sems can dmyal ba nas phyir bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all sentient beings may be turned away from the hells.

original: sems can thams cad byol song gi skye gnas su mi dgod pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad byol song gi skye gnas su mi dgod pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all sentient beings may not be born in the animal realm.

original: sems can thams cad gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas pa dgag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //üîΩsems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i chos thams cad spang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas pa dgag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o // sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i chos thams cad spang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all sentient beings may cease to dwell in the world of Yama.üîΩI dedicate so that all sentient beings may abandon all the phenomena that are obscurations.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dge ba'i rtsa bas shin tu tshim par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dge ba'i rtsa bas shin tu tshim par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all beings may be satisfied with the roots of virtue.

original: chos kyi 'khor lo dus la bab par bskor bas dga' bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor lo dus la bab par bskor bas dga' bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that the wheel of the Dharma may be turned at the right time and so that beings may rejoice.

original: stobs bcu'i 'khor lo la sems can thams cad gzud pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: stobs bcu'i 'khor lo la sems can thams cad gzud pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all sentient beings may enter the wheel of the ten powers.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / smon lam mtha' dang dbus med pa thob par bya ba'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang / smon lam mtha' dang dbus med pa thob par bya ba'am /
translated: I dedicate so that all sentient beings may attain the bodhisattva‚Äôs qualities and aspirations, which are without end or middle.

original: rnam par dag pa'i chos can du bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i chos can du bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that they may become pure.

original: byang chub kyi sems cang shes bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen grangs med pa thams cad dga' bar bya ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems cang shes bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen grangs med pa thams cad dga' bar bya ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate with a mind that delights all the countless spiritual benefactors, so that I may complete the cultivation of the enlightened mind.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la gnas par @42a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo la gnas par @42a *//
translated: I dedicate with the superior intention to abide in the profound Dharma of the Buddha,

original: bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par gzung zhing /
analyzed: bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par gzung zhing /
translated: so that I may uphold all the teachings of the Buddha

original: ye shes kyi snang ba shin tu 'phags par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi snang ba shin tu 'phags par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: and so that I may attain the exalted illumination of wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bsgribs pa med par mngon sum du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bsgribs pa med par mngon sum du 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that I may manifest the unobstructed conduct of a bodhisattva.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du lta bar mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du lta bar mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that I may aspire to behold all the buddhas.

original: chos snang ba thams cad la mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: chos snang ba thams cad la mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that I may aspire to all the illumination of the Dharma.

original: dog pa med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyis 'jigs pa med pa la mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: dog pa med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyis 'jigs pa med pa la mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that they may be fearless, with the fearless mind of enlightenment.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes la mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes la mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that they may have the wisdom of the inconceivable state of the bodhisattvas.

original: sems can thams cad snying rje chen po rnam par dag pas yongs su bskyab pa la mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad snying rje chen po rnam par dag pas yongs su bskyab pa la mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that they may be protected by the pure great compassion of all beings.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' dag ma lus pa lhag ma med pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba dang / brjod du med pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis thams cad brgyan par mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' dag ma lus pa lhag ma med pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba dang / brjod du med pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis thams cad brgyan par mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that they may have the adornments of all the buddha-fields, with the various adornments of the inconceivable buddha-fields.

original: bdud kyi las dang / bdud kyi zhags pa dang / bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rnam par gtor ba dang; rab tu gzhom par mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: bdud kyi las dang / bdud kyi zhags pa dang / bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rnam par gtor ba dang; rab tu gzhom par mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that they may be free from all the actions of Mara, from all the snares of Mara, and from all the disturbances of Mara.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gnas med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas par mngon par mos @42b pas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gnas med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas par mngon par mos @42b pas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate by being intent on the bodhisattva way of life, without dwelling in any buddha-field.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rgya chen pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyud la 'jug par mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o //üîΩdran pa rnam par sbyangs pas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems rgya chen pos sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rgyud la 'jug par mngon par mos pas yongs su bsngo'o // dran pa rnam par sbyangs pas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate by being intent on entering the stream of the Dharma of all buddhas with the vast mind of omniscience.üîΩThey dedicate by purifying mindfulness.

original: blo gros rnam par nges pas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: blo gros rnam par nges pas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate by ascertaining the mind.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rig pas shin tu 'dzin pa'i mngon par shes pas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rig pas shin tu 'dzin pa'i mngon par shes pas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate by the superknowledge of holding fast by knowing all the teachings of the Buddha.

original: blo mtha' dang dbus med cing chags pa med pas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: blo mtha' dang dbus med cing chags pa med pas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate by the mind that is free from attachment, without end or middle.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate by the purity of higher intention.

original: 'gro ba thams cad la byams pa chen po spyod pas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad la byams pa chen po spyod pas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate by the practice of great love for all beings.

original: snying rje chen po la rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: snying rje chen po la rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate with a mind that is intent on great compassion.

original: dga' ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: dga' ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate with a mind of joy.

original: btang snyoms kyis gnyis la chags pa dang bral ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la dbang bsgyur bar gnas pas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: btang snyoms kyis gnyis la chags pa dang bral ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la dbang bsgyur bar gnas pas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate with a mind of equanimity, which is free from attachment to the two, and which is the basis for the mastery of the roots of virtue.

original: rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i chos bsngags pa'i lam rab tu dbye bas chos rnam par dbye ba la zhugs pa dang / chos nyid la nges par gzhog pa'i yid dang sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i chos bsngags pa'i lam rab tu dbye bas chos rnam par dbye ba la zhugs pa dang / chos nyid la nges par gzhog pa'i yid dang sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate with a mind that is intent on the analysis of phenomena, which is engaged in the analysis of phenomena through the path of praise of the Dharma of dependent origination, and which is intent on the nature of reality.

original: dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate with a mind that is a banner of heroism.

original: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa'i mdzod kyi sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa'i mdzod kyi sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate with a mind that is a treasure of the banner of invincibility.

original: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par gtor ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par gtor ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate with a mind that destroys all the circles of MƒÅra.

original: rnam par dag pa dang / chags pa med pa thams cad rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i sems @43a *//üîΩkyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa dang / chags pa med pa thams cad rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i sems @43a *// kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: with a mind to attain all purity and freedom from attachment;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad spyad pa las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad spyad pa las phyir mi ldog par bya ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: with a mind to never turn back from practicing all the bodhisattva deeds;

original: chos dam pa dang rab dang phul la mngon par mos pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: chos dam pa dang rab dang phul la mngon par mos pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: with a mind that is devoted to the highest, most excellent, and sublime Dharma;

original: yon tan gyi chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i ye shes kyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa la mos shing dang ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: yon tan gyi chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i ye shes kyis khyad par du 'phags pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa la mos shing dang ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: with a mind that is devoted to omniscience, which is distinguished by the wisdom that controls all good qualities.

original: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rab tu gzhig pa dang / chags pa med cing dri ma med pa'i chos kyi go 'phang 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdas 'gro ba thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rab tu gzhig pa dang / chags pa med cing dri ma med pa'i chos kyi go 'phang 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdas 'gro ba thams cad la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate with a mind that never turns back from turning the wheel of the Dharma for all beings with the arrow of the Buddha, in order to attain the level of the stainless, unattached Dharma, in order to destroy all the disturbances of Mara, in order to fulfill all wishes, and in order to attain the great light of the Dharma realm, the wisdom of the Tathagata, adorned with the light of a hundred thousand special rays of the sun of the Dharma.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi nyi ma rab dang phul khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'od zer brgya stong gis brgyan pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes chen po'i snang ba 'gro ba thams cad du rab tu dgye ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi nyi ma rab dang phul khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'od zer brgya stong gis brgyan pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes chen po'i snang ba 'gro ba thams cad du rab tu dgye ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate with a mind that radiates the great light of the Dharma realm, the wisdom of the Tathagata, adorned with the light of a hundred thousand special rays of the sun of the Dharma, in order to attain the level of the stainless, unattached Dharma, in order to destroy all the disturbances of Mara, in order to fulfill all wishes, and in order to attain the great light of the Dharma realm, the wisdom of the Tathagata, adorned with the light of a hundred thousand special rays of the sun of the Dharma.

original: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya zhing gdul ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems kyi rgyud shin tu tshim par bya ba dang; sngon gyi smon lam chen po nub pa med pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mur spyod pa chen po'i rgyud rgyun mi 'chad cing rnam par dag pa dang /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya zhing gdul ba dang / bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems kyi rgyud shin tu tshim par bya ba dang; sngon gyi smon lam chen po nub pa med pas phyi ma'i mtha'i mur spyod pa chen po'i rgyud rgyun mi 'chad cing rnam par dag pa dang /
translated: It is to ripen and guide all beings. It is to satisfy the mind streams of beings according to their wishes. It is to be without decline in one‚Äôs great aspirations and to have a pure and uninterrupted continuum of great conduct that lasts until the end of time.

original: snang ba dri ma med pas rgyags pa dang / dregs @43b pa dang; nga rgyal shin tu gcad pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnam par gtor ba dang / sred pa'i dra ba yang dag par gtub pa dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa thibs po bsal ba dang; bsgribs pa med cing dri ma dang bral la chags pa med pa'i chos kyi lo shin tu legs pa dang /
analyzed: snang ba dri ma med pas rgyags pa dang / dregs @43b pa dang; nga rgyal shin tu gcad pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnam par gtor ba dang / sred pa'i dra ba yang dag par gtub pa dang / ma rig pa'i mun pa thibs po bsal ba dang; bsgribs pa med cing dri ma dang bral la chags pa med pa'i chos kyi lo shin tu legs pa dang /
translated: It is to be free of pride, arrogance, and conceit through stainless illumination. It is to destroy the afflictions of all beings. It is to cut through the net of craving. It is to dispel the thick darkness of ignorance. It is to have an excellent, stainless, immaculate, and unattached Dharma harvest.

original: 'gro ba thams cad du bskal pa'i grangs rnam par 'chad pa med pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / spyod pa'i rgyud las phyir mi ldog pas sems can gyi tshogs so sor chags pa med pa'i ye shes rab dam pa mchog rnam par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang; sems can re re las sangs rgyas kyi sku shin tu bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa las phyir
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad du bskal pa'i grangs rnam par 'chad pa med pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / spyod pa'i rgyud las phyir mi ldog pas sems can gyi tshogs so sor chags pa med pa'i ye shes rab dam pa mchog rnam par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang; sems can re re las sangs rgyas kyi sku shin tu bstan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa las phyir
translated: They dedicate so that all beings may attain omniscient wisdom, without interruption in the enumeration of eons.üîΩThey dedicate so that the assembly of beings may attain the supreme, sublime wisdom that is free from attachment.

original: mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: mi ldog par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate so that each and every being may attain the wisdom of the buddhas, without turning back from the emanations that manifest the body of a buddha.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo yang 'dod pa'i yul dang / khams gsum pa la gnas shing yongs su mi bsngo ste /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo yang 'dod pa'i yul dang / khams gsum pa la gnas shing yongs su mi bsngo ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIn this way, bodhisattvas dedicate their roots of virtue, but they do not dedicate them while dwelling in the objects of desire or in the three realms.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'dod ma chags pas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'dod ma chags pas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
translated: Because bodhisattvas should dedicate their roots of virtue without attachment to desire.

original: byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams zhe mi sdang bas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //üîΩbyang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gti mug med pas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams zhe mi sdang bas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o // byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gti mug med pas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
translated: Bodhisattvas should dedicate the roots of virtue without anger.üîΩBodhisattvas should dedicate the roots of virtue without delusion.üîΩBodhisattvas should dedicate the roots of virtue without harm.

original: byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gnod pa med pas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //üîΩbyang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba @44a *//üîΩrnams nga rgyal med pas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //üîΩbyang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams g-yo med pas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //üîΩbyang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams drang pos yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams gnod pa med pas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o // byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba @44a *// rnams nga rgyal med pas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o // byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams g-yo med pas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o // byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams drang pos yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
translated: Bodhisattvas should dedicate the roots of virtue without pride.üîΩBodhisattvas should dedicate the roots of virtue without deceit.üîΩBodhisattvas should dedicate the roots of virtue with honesty.

original: byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rig pas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rig pas yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
translated: Bodhisattvas should dedicate the roots of virtue with knowledge.

original: byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon par brtson pas yongs su bsngo bar bya ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon par brtson pas yongs su bsngo bar bya ste /
translated: The bodhisattva should dedicate the roots of virtue with great effort.

original: de de ltar yongs su bsngo bas sems rab tu dang ba 'thob bo //
analyzed: de de ltar yongs su bsngo bas sems rab tu dang ba 'thob bo //
translated: In this way, through dedication, he will attain a clear mind.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la go skabs dbye ba 'thob bo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la go skabs dbye ba 'thob bo //
translated: He will attain the opportunity to practice the bodhisattva practices.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i lam rnam par dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will purify the path of the bodhisattva.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will enter the family of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: He will accomplish the wisdom of the buddhas.

original: 'jig rten gyi nyes pa thams cad rab tu spong ngo //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi nyes pa thams cad rab tu spong ngo //
translated: He will abandon all the faults of the world.

original: bsam pa shin tu tshim par bya ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yongs su bstan pa dang / spyod pa rnams rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba dang / theg pa chen po'i sa la chos thams cad rnam par dgod pa yang dag par bstan pa dang /
